thread.title: [Update: More markets] Free Bookcover Keyboard being offered with Galaxy Tab S3 pre-orders in Germany
thread.title_full: [Update: More markets] Free Bookcover Keyboard being offered with Galaxy Tab S3 pre-orders in Germany

author: Adnan F.
title: [Update: More markets] Free Bookcover Keyboard being offered with Galaxy Tab S3 pre-orders in Germany
text:
Adnan F. / 5 hours ago 
Samsung’s new tablets had the spotlight to themselves at the Mobile World Congress 2017 in Barcelona last month as the company decided against launching the Galaxy S8 at this event. It unveiled its new Android-powered flagship tablet – the Galaxy Tab S3 – and now we’re waiting for it to be released. Samsung said that the tablet would be released later in March with prices starting at 670 euro. 
Samsung Germany is offering a good deal to those who pre-order this tablet until March 23rd. Those customers will receive a free Bookcover Keyboard for the Galaxy Tab S3, that’s a 130 euro saving. Samsung announced this accessory with the tablet back at MWC 2017, it adds a robust physical keyboard to the tablet and also doubles as a case. 
This pre-order deal appears to be limited to customers in Germany at this point in time so it remains to be seen if Samsung will provide a similar pre-order incentive to customers elsewhere around the world. 
Update: We’ve heard that this offer has also been extended to pre-order customers in Netherlands and a handful of other markets across Europe.
